definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Tunisia should learn from China's experiences in developing its country.
sentences.chinese: 中国的治国经验对突尼斯有很好的借鉴作用。

sentences.english: The Tunisian economic miracle was an illusion, they claimed.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣称，突尼斯的经济奇迹只是一种幻象。

sentences.english: Ghannouchi warmly welcomed Jiang's visit on behalf of the Tunisian government.
sentences.chinese: 加努希代表突尼斯政府对江主席的来访表示热烈欢迎。

sentences.english: A "celebrated" Tunisian rapper supports Shariah law.
sentences.chinese: 一个“有名的”突尼斯说唱歌手支持伊斯兰教法。

sentences.english: Ordinary Tunisians kept their heads down and attended to their work.
sentences.chinese: 普通的突尼斯人埋起头来，默不作声，只专注于工作。

sentences.english: On May 7-8, Tunis and Bizerte are captured.
sentences.chinese: 五月7至8日，突尼斯和比塞大被盟军攻占。

sentences.english: There are hundreds of children waiting in camps in Tunisia and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 有几百名儿童在突尼斯和埃及的营中等待救援。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister of Tunisia Hamadi Jebali has announced his resignation in a live television address.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯总理杰巴里在电视直播讲话中宣布辞职。

sentences.english: Tunisians and, later, Egyptians took to the streets.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯人及之后的埃及人纷纷上街表示不满。

sentences.english: Tunisia and Egypt both make the list, and have been overthrown.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯和埃及政府已经被推翻，并且双双榜上有名。

sentences.english: Now, some Tunisians are protesting against the new government.
sentences.chinese: 现在，一些突尼斯人对新的政府发起了抗议活动。

sentences.english: The party is expected to emerge from Tunisia's first elections with real power.
sentences.chinese: 党可望摆脱有实权突尼斯的第一次选举。

sentences.english: Here, the people are sick too — more so than they were in Tunisia.
sentences.chinese: 这里，人都也感到憎恶，甚至比突尼斯人更强烈。

sentences.english: Its name is derived from the capital Tunis located in the north-east.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯因其坐落于国家北方的首都突尼斯市而得名。

sentences.english: Its name is derived from the capital Tunis located in the north-east.
sentences.chinese: 突尼斯因其坐落于国家北方的首都突尼斯市而得名。
突尼斯的前政府取缔了ENNAHDA。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina
Côte d'Ivoire or Ivory Coast in West Africa
